description: Lysophosphatidic acid acts through GPR35 to induce tumor necrosis factor expression in macrophages.
GPR35 modulates the expression of TNF in macrophages.
Mice lacking GPR35 exhibit decreased transcript levels of the Cyp11b1 gene.
Administration of TNF restores Cyp11b1 expression in GPR35-deficient mice.
GPR35 signaling is involved in maintaining intestinal homeostasis and preventing colitis.
